title: Ottiyanam Senji Tharen Song Lyrics Arul
stanzas: <div>Ottiyanam Senji Tharen Song Lyrics Arul

Ottiyaanam senji thaaren vaariya
naan otti kolla
enakonjam thaariyaa

ottiyaanam kittiyaanam thevaya
idai kattikolla kai rendu illaiyaa

mookku muzhi ullavale
muthathirukku nallavale
maaralavu naan eduthu
muthu maalai tharavaa

muchathila ullavavae
machamulla manmathane
maaralvu edukkayila
nee oralavu thodavaa

velli kodame
thanga vadame
indha chiyaan pakkam
thirumbu

sandhu kedachaa
vandu adippa
idhu coimbatore kurumbu

Ottiyaanam senji thaaren vaariya
naan otti kolla
enakonjam thaariyaa

ottiyaanam kittiyaanam thevaya
idai kattikolla kai rendu illaiyaa

Suththa thangam pathavachi
natchathira kalluvachi
nethti suthti pannithaaren
nee suththi vaariyaa

nethi sutti thevayilla
neela kallum thevayilla
nethiyila kungumatha
nee vachivida vaariyaa

un kaththi mookkoda
muthu mookkuthi
kuthivida poren variyaa

un mutha mookkuthi
uppukkaagaathu
mookkil mookorasa variyaa

thangathodu naathaaren
angathodu nee variyaa
thodu podum kaathodu
mugoortha thaethi sollaiyaa

Ottiyaanam senji thaaren vaariya
naan otti kolla
enakonjam thaariyaa

ottiyaanam kittiyaanam thevaya
idai kattikolla kai rendu illaiyaa

Velli katti vetti thatti
sillu sillu mani katti
kolusuga pannithaaren
nee kooda maada vaariyaa

koodamaada vaarathukku
kolusuga thaevayilla
nee genda kaalil nandu pola
un sundu viral thaeyumaiyyaa

adi vanji un kaiyyil
konji vilaiyaada valayal
naan thaaren variyaa

ada valaiyal vendaame
ippa varuvene
vazhathu kai konjam thariyaa

thanga chainu naan thaaren
thammaa thundu nee thariyaa
manja kairu nee thanthaa
enna uruchi thaarenyaa

ottiyaan ottiyaanam ottiyaanam
atha senjithaaren
senjithaaren vaariyaa

danda nakka danda nakka
danda nakkaa
idai katti kolla kai rendu illaiyaa

mookku muzhi ullavale
muthathirukku nallavale
maaralavu naan eduthu
muthu maalai tharavaa

muchathila ullavavae
machamulla manmathane
maaralvu edukkayila
nee oralavu thodavaa

velli kodame
thanga vadame
indha chiyaan pakkam
thirumbu

sandhu kedachaa
vandu adippa
ingu venaam
venaam kurumbu.

seo.title: Ottiyanam Senji Tharen Song Lyrics Arul
seo.description: Get the complete Ottiyanam Senji Tharen Song Lyrics Arul from Arul. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Hariharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Arul, Harrish Jeyaraj, Hariharan, Sri Madhumitha, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
